name: BACnet LAN Monitor
short_description: This project has two parts, a daemon and a web interface.  The daemon listens for BACnet/IP traffic, classifies it, and can send alerts for some types of behavior.  The web interface displays summary charts for the information it finds, grouped by the layers of the BACnet/IP stack.  The daemon is based on the BACpypes library, the web application is based on the bottle framework, and they communicate via redis.  The web interface can take advantage of deamonlogger capture files for additional analysis.
